title: UK and Central European linkages for wheat genetics, physiology, and breeding
impactText: A conference in Hungary has brought together wheat physiologists, geneticists and modellers to discuss options for adapting wheat to future climate. Agriculture, Food and Drink Economic
findingsText: An expert network, including wheat breeders and researchers, to exchange ideas and material for improved breeding for adaptation. Exchange of knowledge was key objective. This knowledge will be taken forward into the research and application of the participants of this network. Agriculture, Food and Drink
